metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert three 3V CR123 batteries with correct polarity
2. The Smoke Detector will sound 2 short beeps and Red LED will flash
3. Wait for the 1-minute warm-up period
4. Press the Function button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
5. The Smoke Detector will emit a 2-tone beep and LED will turn on briefly
6. Wait for calibration to complete (indicated by 2-tone beep and Red LED turning off)
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Smoke Detector will be removed from the Z-wave network.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the batteries from the Smoke Detector
2. Press and hold the Function button
3. While holding the Function button, re-insert the batteries and wait for 20 seconds
